text: Marion Anthony Trabert (August 16, 1930 â€“ February 3, 2021) was an American amateur World No. 1 tennis player and commentator. He was born in Cincinnati, Ohio. He won the French Open in 1954 and 1955, the Australian Open in 1955 the Wimbledon Championships in 1955, and the US Open in 1953, 1954 and 1955. Trabert died on February 3, 2021 at his home in Ponte Vedra Beach, Florida at the age of 90.Tony Trabert, Major Champion & Tennis Icon, Dies Aged 90 ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2021 deaths Category:American tennis players Category:American sports commentators Category:Sportspeople from Cincinnati Category:French Open champions Category:Australian Open champions Category:Wimbledon champions Category:US Open (tennis) champions
title: Tony Trabert
